author: mtosi
body:
it is the 94x version of PR #19622

as requested by tracking POG (@VinInn @rovere @makortel )
this PR does

- fix the client (some hit efficiency plots were missing)
- add the monitoring of muon->innerTrack
  new plots are under Muons/Tracking/innerTrack
  (as suggested/requested/proposed by @VinInn )
   a pT > 10 GeV cut is applied to muons
title: add muon->innerTrack monitoring in DQM
